job_description:
• Experience with semiconductor metrology, inspection, and parametric test methods.
• Experience in semiconductor device physics, CMOS, flash, DRAM, or probe/test flows.
• Knowledge and experience with statistical process control (SPC).
• 2 or less years of experience in the semiconductor industry (manufacturing, research, or other support roles).
• Semiconductor device knowledge, or Semiconductor processing and fabrication experience.
• Strong structured problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.
• Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or a related technical field.
• Knowledge of Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA).
